attributes.additional_details: Broad is still England’s premier bowler and it is not fair on the nation that we should do without him. He’s been our leading wicket taker in this Ashes series and has clearly still got several good years in him yet. The prospect of him retiring is both unsavoury and improper.
attributes.background: Move immediately to stop Stuart Broad from retiring from cricket.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for. 
 
Decisions about cricket players' retirements are a matter for players and clubs, not the UK Government or Parliament.
